title: 3 Perma Skin Reroll?
body: I was wondering if I reroll 3 perma skin shards will that give me a more rare skin shard or no?

replies.body:
No, rerolling is essentially random, other than the fact that it prioritizes giving you content you don't already own and is eligible to be Hextech loot (No Championship Riven). For complete details on this, check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).

Let me know if you have any questions.
